components.description: An undercover investigator, wearing a hat, and sometimes using a magnifying glass to closely inspect evidence. This emoji did not originally recommend emoji modifiers, but a proposal was created to address this.
components.title: Sleuth or Spy

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

description: The male version of the üïµ Sleuth or Spy emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.
title: Man Detective

emoji_net_data.name: man detective

bn:00072138n: A detective who follows a trail
The Mickey Mouse universe is a fictional universe in which the Disney cartoon character Mickey Mouse lives.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00026633n: Police officer who looks for evidence.
A police officer who investigates crimes

Skill level in the Purble Place game. Once a Purble Place game is completed, a player gets a skill level rank assigned automatically by the game (based on number of guesses and hints during the game).
A person who investigates crimes, can be a rank and job in a police department, state or federal employee, or a civilian called a private detective
Investigator, either a member of a police agency or a private person
A police officer who looks for evidence as part of solving a crime; an investigator.
A detective is an investigator, usually a member of a law enforcement agency.
Someone who investigates by carefully analyzing each clue.
